<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_38"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_38"></span>**<sup>38</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_38)At the same time I should like here to declare that this political decision means a tremendous departure for the future, and that it is a final one. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_39"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_39"></span>**<sup>39</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_39)<st1:country-region w:st="on">Russia</st1:country-region> and <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Germany</st1:country-region></st1:place> fought against one another in the World War. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_40"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_40"></span>**<sup>40</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_40)That shall and will not happen a second time. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_41"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_41"></span>**<sup>41</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_41)In <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:city w:st="on">Moscow</st1:city></st1:place>, too, this pact was greeted exactly as you greet it. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_42"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_42"></span>**<sup>42</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_42)I can only endorse word for word the speech of Russian Foreign Commissar, Molotov.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_43"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_43"></span>**<sup>43</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_43)I am determined to solve (1) the Danzig question; (2) the question of the Corridor; and (3) to see to it that a change is made in the relationship between <st1:country-region w:st="on">Germany</st1:country-region> and <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Poland</st1:country-region></st1:place> that shall ensure a peaceful co-existence. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_44"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_44"></span>**<sup>44</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_44)In this I am resolved to continue to fight until either the present Polish government is willing to continue to bring about this change or until another Polish Government is ready to do so. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_45"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_45"></span>**<sup>45</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_45)I am resolved to remove from the German frontiers the element of uncertainty, the everlasting atmosphere of conditions resembling civil war. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_46"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_46"></span>**<sup>46</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_46)I will see to it that in the East there is, on the frontier, a peace precisely similar to that on our other frontiers.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_47"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_47"></span>**<sup>47</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_47)In this I will take the necessary measures to see that they do not contradict the proposals I have already made known in the Reichstag itself to the rest of the world, that is to say, I will not war against women and children. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_48"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_48"></span>**<sup>48</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_48)I have ordered my air force to restrict itself to attacks on military objectives. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_49"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_49"></span>**<sup>49</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_49)If, however, the enemy thinks he can form that draw carte blanche on his side to fight by the other methods he will receive an answer that will deprive him of hearing and sight.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_50"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_50"></span>**<sup>50</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_50)This night for the first time Polish regular soldiers fired on our territory. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_51"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_51"></span>**<sup>51</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_51)Since 5.45 A.M. we have been returning the fire, and from now on bombs will be met by bombs. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_52"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_52"></span>**<sup>52</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_52)Whoever fight with poison gas will be fought with poison gas. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_53"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_53"></span>**<sup>53</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_53)Whoever departs from the rules of humane warfare can only expect that we shall do the same. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_54"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_54"></span>**<sup>54</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_54)I will continue this struggle, no matter against whom, until the safety of the Reich and its rights are secured.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_55"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_55"></span>**<sup>55</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_55)For six years now I have been working on the building up of the German defenses. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_56"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_56"></span>**<sup>56</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_56)Over 90 millions have in that time been spent on the building up of these defense forces. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_57"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_57"></span>**<sup>57</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_57)They are now the best equipped and are above all comparison with what they were in 1914\. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_58"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_58"></span>**<sup>58</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_58)My trust in them is unshakable. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_59"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_59"></span>**<sup>59</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_59)When I called up these forces and when I now ask sacrifices of the German people and if necessary every sacrifice, then I have a right to do so, for I also am to-day absolutely ready, just as we were formerly, to make every possible sacrifice.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_60"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_60"></span>**<sup>60</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_60)I am asking of no German man more than I myself was ready throughout four years at any time to do. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_61"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_61"></span>**<sup>61</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_61)There will be no hardships for Germans to which I myself will not submit. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_62"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_62"></span>**<sup>62</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_62)My whole life henceforth belongs more than ever to my people. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_63"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_63"></span>**<sup>63</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_63)I am from now on just first soldier of the German Reich. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_64"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_64"></span>**<sup>64</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_64)I have once more put on that coat that was the most sacred and dear to me. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_65"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_65"></span>**<sup>65</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_65)I will not take it off again until victory is secured, or I will not survive the outcome.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_66"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_66"></span>**<sup>66</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_66)As a National Socialist and as German soldier I enter upon this struggle with a stout heart. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_67"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_67"></span>**<sup>67</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_67)My whole life has been nothing but one long struggle for my people, for its restoration, and for <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Germany</st1:country-region></st1:place>. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_68"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_68"></span>**<sup>68</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_68)There was only one watchword for that struggle: faith in this people. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_69"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_69"></span>**<sup>69</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_69)One word I have never learned: that is, surrender.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_70"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_70"></span>**<sup>70</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_70)If, however, anyone thinks that we are facing a hard time, I should ask him to remember that once a Prussian King, with a ridiculously small State, opposed a stronger coalition, and in three wars finally came out successful because that State had that stout heart that we need in these times. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_71"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_71"></span>**<sup>71</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_71)I would, therefore, like to assure all the world that a November 1918 will never be repeated in German history. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_72"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_72"></span>**<sup>72</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_72)Just as I myself am ready at any time to stake my life – anyone can take it for my people and for <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Germany</st1:country-region></st1:place> – so I ask the same of all others.

<a name="E_dienvan_e_26_73"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_73"></span>**<sup>73</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_73)Whoever, however, thinks he can oppose this national command, whether directly or indirectly, shall fall. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_74"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_74"></span>**<sup>74</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_74)We have nothing to do with traitors. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_75"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_75"></span>**<sup>75</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_75)We are all faithful to our old principle. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_76"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_76"></span>**<sup>76</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_76)It is quite unimportant whether we ourselves live, but it is essential that our people shall live, that <st1:place w:st="on"><st1:country-region w:st="on">Germany</st1:country-region></st1:place> shall live. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_77"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_77"></span>**<sup>77</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_77)The sacrifice that is demanded of us is not greater than the sacrifice that many generations have made. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_78"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_78"></span>**<sup>78</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_78)If we form a community closely bound together by vows, ready for anything, resolved never to surrender, then our will will master every hardship and difficulty. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_79"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_79"></span>**<sup>79</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_79)And I would like to close with the declaration that I once made when I began the struggle for power in the Reich. <a name="E_dienvan_e_26_80"></a>[<span style="mso-bookmark:E_dienvan_e_26_80"></span>**<sup>80</sup>**](#E_dienvan_v_26_80)I then said: “If our will is so strong that no hardship and suffering can subdue it, then our will and our German might shall prevail.”

<span style="mso-bidi-font-size:
12.0pt"></span>

</span>

</div>

</o:smarttagtype></o:smarttagtype></o:smarttagtype></o:smarttagtype></o:smarttagtype></o:smarttagtype>
